content:
Joe is building a fort for his little brother out of boxes. He is wondering how much room there will be inside the fort.
 
[[☃ image 1]]

**How much space is inside the fort?**  
*Give an exact answer (do not round).*

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] $\text{m}^3$

options.alt: Two rectangles that share a common side. The larger rectangle is labeled with length equals 1 meter and width equals 0.75 meters. The smaller rectangle is labeled with length equals 0.5 meters and width equals 0.5 meters.
